name: Music_959.wav
keywords: ['pop music', 'remix', 'electronic', 'dance', 'female vocal', 'male vocal', 'vocal samples', 'turntable', 'electronic drums', 'strings sample', 'groovy', 'hip', 'modern']
caption: This is a dance remix of a pop music piece. There are two vocals in the piece, one male and one female. Heavy effects are used on the vocals to make them repeat syllables. There is a repeating string sample as the melody. A complex electronic drum beat provides the rhythmic background. The piece has a groovy feel. It can be played at nightclubs. It could also be used in the soundtrack of a high school drama.
